When the third angel\92s message closes, mercy no longer pleads for the guilty inhabitants of the earth. The people of God have accomplished their work. They have received \93the latter rain,\94\93the . . . refreshing . . . from 
333
the presence of the Lord,\94 and they are prepared for the trying hour before them. Angels are hastening to and fro in heaven. An angel returning from the earth announces that his work is done; the final test has been brought upon the world, and all who have proved themselves loyal to the divine precepts have received \93the seal of the living God.\94 Then Jesus ceases His intercession in the sanctuary above. He lifts His hands and with a loud voice says, \93It is done.\94 . . .
